Key Match Events: Ildemaro Vargas hit a two-run double off Aroldis Chapman in Washington’s four-run ninth inning.
Chaparro homered to left (426 feet), Millas scored.
Kiner-Falefa singled to center, De La Cruz scored, Bart to third.
Reynolds grounded into fielder's choice to shortstop, Bart scored, Kiner-Falefa out at second.
Wood singled to left, Millas scored.
Vargas doubled to center, Young scored and Wood scored.
Ruiz doubled to left, Vargas scored.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at PNC Park in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
The game lasted 3 hours and 20 minutes.
Umpires for the game were Charlie Ramos, Edwin Jimenez, Marvin Hudson, and James Jean.
